summary: Fixed language routing gaps across 16 .claude/ files: added missing typst/latex/meta entries to routing tables, replaced stale lean references with neovim, removed non-routing python/shell/json entries, and updated skill trigger conditions to match actual routing.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary with verification results for all 7 phases

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed language routing inconsistencies across 16 .claude/ files. All routing tables now consistently use 6 recognized languages (neovim, general, meta, markdown, latex, typst). Replaced stale lean references with neovim, removed non-routing python/shell/json entries, updated skill trigger conditions, and removed obsolete /lake command documentation.
